freeVotes.title: Free superpoll votes
freeVotes.body: Get a free vote on every superpoll made by {{nickname}}

suggestions.title: More control
suggestions.body: Only <0>you</0> will have the power to add custom options to <1/>'s superpolls

0.a: Subscribing to your favorite creator lets you unlock exclusive extras. These include 1-on-1 convos with that creator, free votes on every Superpoll the creator makes, and the power to add your own options to their Superpolls.

1.a: Every creator sets their own subscription price and subscriptions start as low as $2.99 per month.

2.q: When I subscribe to one creator, does it mean I'm subscribed to all creators?
2.a: Your subscription gives you access to the specific creator you chose on NewNew.

3.a: Yes. You can cancel a subscription at any time. Just go to the creator's profile, open the "More" menu and then tap unsubscribe. Don't worryâ€¦if you cancel in the middle of your billing period, you'll still be able to interact with the creator until the end of the billing period.

4.q: Do all creators offer a subscription?
4.a: No. Although every creator can offer subscriptions, some creators choose not to.
